name: Absolone
description:
You are in a futuristic world. Here, you must traverse across the Space station and fight off hostile inhabitants. Armed with a weapon and athleticism, you face the endless hordes of enemies and deal with tricky puzzle-like environments from one point to the other. In this story-driven single-player game, it's up to you to fight the Enemy AI.

TR15T9, the main character, was a worker in Vita, until one day while working he becomes aware of what he is and aware he can make his own choices. Once he became aware Vita was updated of one of their robots becoming sentient. Taking him out, they push him down the trash shoot to be scrapped before he can cause any more robots to become aware. Naming himself Tristian the main character now makes his way to escape the factory. 

Your character, Tristan must escape the factory by figuring out puzzles and finding keycards. in order to escape.

The story of the game places you (the main character) inside of a factory converting humans into machines. The main form of progression from level to level or area to area will be to traverse the puzzle-like stage layout acquiring components to make your mechanical robot body stronger. Then using those new upgrades to defeat the section boss and continue your progress until you are able to finally leave the factory. You will fail if your robot body’s health meter reaches zero from taking enemy damage prior to exiting the factory. Smaller quests may include missions that inform the player as to how the robots came to take charge in the first place.

One example of a puzzle or challenge in the game will be to correctly position a moveable box into a certain area on the stage without taking damage from enemies so that a closed door/wall will open for you to progress.
